data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
The starting point is always facing forward. Once you have taken 10 steps forward, you return to the starting point. So, the answer is yes.
If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Take 4 steps. Turn around. Take 4 steps. Turn around. Turn right. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
Just because you take 4 steps, you will turn around. It would return back to the starting point. So, the answer is yes.

You start with 6 steps and take 4 steps back to where you started. You turn around and take 10 steps from where you started. Thus, the answer is Yes.

Take 1 step first and keep going so you take 7 steps. Take 7 steps twice, take 1 step first and take 7 steps again. Turn left, take 5 steps. So, the answer is Yes.
